name: Light Connect Puzzle
description:
Light Connect Puzzle is the most addictive puzzle game you are looking for!

Connect the same color balls with a line to make them shining and make sure to cover the entire board then you can pass a level successfully. Gameplay ranges from simple and relaxed, to challenging and frenetic. Just have a try, and exercise your brain.

Features：
· Over 1000 free challenging puzzles
· Colorful graphics and nice sound effects
· Cool and shiny animation after connecting two lighting balls correctly

Come on, enjoy it!
